sqlMap.select:
SELECT DATATIME as "datatime", MN as "mn", SITEID as "siteid", SITENAME as "sitename", FACTORID as "factorid", FACTORNAME as "factorname", QN as "qn", ST as "st", CN as "cn", VALUEZS as "valuezs", ALARMTYPE as "alarmtype", ALARMSTATUS as "alarmstatus", ALARMINFO as "alarminfo", SENDTIME as "sendtime", SENDSTATUS as "sendstatus", FILLTIME as "filltime", FILLSTATUS as "fillstatus", FILLMAN as "fillman", FILLID as "fillid", PORTNAME as "portname", PORTID as "portid", HLIMIT as "hlimit", LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", CONTROL_LINE as "controlLine", STANDARD_VALUE as "standardValue", VALUE_REAL as "valueReal" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE 1=1
DATATIME = #datatime#
MN = #mn#
FACTORID = #factorid#
CN = #cn#
$orderBy$
DATATIME asc, MN asc, FACTORID asc, CN asc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE 1=1
DATATIME = #datatime#
MN = #mn#
FACTORID = #factorid#
CN = #cn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT (DATATIME, MN, SITEID, SITENAME, FACTORID, FACTORNAME, QN, ST, CN, VALUEZS, ALARMTYPE, ALARMSTATUS, ALARMINFO, SENDTIME, SENDSTATUS, FILLTIME, FILLSTATUS, FILLMAN, FILLID, PORTNAME, PORTID, HLIMIT, LOWLIMIT, NKHLIMIT, NKLOWLIMIT, CONTROL_LINE, STANDARD_VALUE, VALUE_REAL ) VALUES (#datatime:VARCHAR#, #mn:VARCHAR#, #siteid:VARCHAR#, #sitename:VARCHAR#, #factorid:VARCHAR#, #factorname:VARCHAR#, #qn:VARCHAR#, #st:VARCHAR#, #cn:VARCHAR#, #valuezs:VARCHAR#, #alarmtype:VARCHAR#, #alarmstatus:VARCHAR#, #alarminfo:VARCHAR#, #sendtime:VARCHAR#, #sendstatus:VARCHAR#, #filltime:VARCHAR#, #fillstatus:VARCHAR#, #fillman:VARCHAR#, #fillid:VARCHAR#, #portname:VARCHAR#, #portid:VARCHAR#, #hlimit:VARCHAR#, #lowlimit:VARCHAR#, #nkhlimit:VARCHAR#, #nklowlimit:VARCHAR#, #controlLine:VARCHAR#, #standardValue:VARCHAR#, #valueReal:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE DATATIME = #datatime# AND MN = #mn# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND CN = #cn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT SET SITEID = #siteid#, SITENAME = #sitename#, FACTORNAME = #factorname#, QN = #qn#, ST = #st#, VALUEZS = #valuezs#, ALARMTYPE = #alarmtype#, ALARMSTATUS = #alarmstatus#, ALARMINFO = #alarminfo#, SENDTIME = #sendtime#, SENDSTATUS = #sendstatus#, FILLTIME = #filltime#, FILLSTATUS = #fillstatus#, FILLMAN = #fillman#, FILLID = #fillid#, PORTNAME = #portname#, PORTID = #portid#, HLIMIT = #hlimit#, LOWLIMIT = #lowlimit#, NKHLIMIT = #nkhlimit#, NKLOWLIMIT = #nklowlimit#, CONTROL_LINE = #controlLine#, STANDARD_VALUE = #standardValue#, VALUE_REAL = #valueReal# WHERE DATATIME = #datatime# AND MN = #mn# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND CN = #cn#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT SET FILLID = #fillid#
WHERE DATATIME = #datatime# AND MN = #mn# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND CN = #cn#
UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT SET FILLID = #fillid# WHERE DATATIME gt;= #starttime# and DATATIME lt;=#endtime# and siteid = #siteid# AND FACTORNAME = #factorname# AND CN = #cn#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT t1.DATATIME "datatime", substr(t1.DATATIME,1,13) "showtime", t1.MN as "mn", t1.SITEID as "siteid", t1.SITENAME as "sitename", t1.FACTORID as "factorid", t1.FACTORNAME as "factorname", t1.QN as "qn", t1.ST as "st", t1.CN as "cn", t1.VALUEZS as "valuezs", t1.ALARMTYPE as "alarmtype", t1.ALARMSTATUS as "alarmstatus", t1.ALARMINFO as "alarminfo", t1.SENDTIME as "sendtime", t1.SENDSTATUS as "sendstatus", t1.FILLTIME as "filltime", t1.FILLSTATUS as "fillstatus", t1.FILLMAN as "fillman", t1.FILLID as "fillid", t1.PORTNAME as "portname", t1.PORTID as "portid", t1.HLIMIT as "hlimit", t1.LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", t1.NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", t1.NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", t1.CONTROL_LINE as "controlLine", t1.STANDARD_VALUE as "standardValue", t1.VALUE_REAL as "valueReal" ,
t2.DECLARE_ID as "declareId", t2.DECLARE_REASON as "declareReason" , t2.DECLARE_STATUS as "declareStatus", t2.AUDIT_STATUS as "auditStatus", t2.AUDIT_STATUS_NAME as "auditStatusName", t2.FAULT_TYPE as "faultType", t2.ABNORMAL_START_TIME as "abnormalStartTime", t2.ABNORMAL_END_TIME as "abnormalEndTime", t2.FACTOR_NAMES as "factorNames", t2.TREATMENT_MEASURES as "treatmentMeasures", t2.DECLARANT as "declarant", t2.PHONE as "phone", t2.REPORT_TIME as "reportTime",
t3.DEPARTID as "companyId", t4.haltstatus as "haltstatus"
FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HF_ABNORMAL_DECLARE t2 ON t1.FILLID = t2.DECLARE_ID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE t3 ON t1.SITEID = t3.SITEID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t5.siteid, t5.status AS haltstatus, t5.BEGINTIME, t5.ENDTIME FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HF_HALTDECLARE t5 where t5.STATUS='s2') t4 ON t1.siteid=t4.siteid and substr(t1.DATATIME,1,13)<=SUBSTR(t4.ENDTIME,1,13) and substr(t1.DATATIME,1,13)>=SUBSTR(t4.BEGINTIME,1,13) and (t1.FILLID is null or t1.FILLID='') WHERE 1=1
t1.DATATIME >= #startTime#
t1.DATATIME <= #endTime#
t1.CN = #cn#
t1.CONTROL_LINE = #controlLine#
t1.ST = #st#
t1.monitorid = #monitorid#
t1.factorid = #factorid#
t3.DEPARTID like #companyId#
t1.siteid = #siteid#
t1.alarmtype in ($alarmtype$)
t1.siteid not in ($sifts$)
(t1.FILLID is null or t1.FILLID ='')
t2.AUDIT_STATUS like #auditStatus#
$orderBy$
MN asc, FACTORID asc, DATATIME asc, CN asc

SELECT substr(a.DATATIME,6,8) as "datatime", a.MN as "mn", a.SITEID as "siteid", a.SITENAME as "sitename", FACTORID as "factorid", FACTORNAME as "factorname", VALUEZS as "valuezs", HLIMIT as "hlimit", LOWLIMIT as "lowlimit", NKHLIMIT as "nkhlimit", NKLOWLIMIT as "nklowlimit", VALUE_REAL as "valueReal", alarminfo as "alarminfo" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT a left join ${hbSchema}.VIEW_T_HA_SITE b on(a.siteid=b.siteid) WHERE 1=1 and b.DEPARTMENTID like '$departmentId$'
a.DATATIME >= #startTime#
a.DATATIME <= #endTime#
a.cn = #cn#
a.CONTROL_LINE = #controlLine#
a.alarmtype in ($alarmtype$)
$orderBy$
a.DATATIME desc, a.siteid asc, FACTORID asc
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_ALARM_OVERLIMIT WHERE DATATIME = #datatime# AND MN = #mn# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND CN = #cn# and ALARMTYPE= #alarmtype#
